items.title: Vast crowd enjoys free Lady Gaga concert in Brazil
items.description: More than two million people attend a Lady Gaga concert on Copacabana beach, paid for by Rio de Janeiro city to help boost the economy.

items.title: Jewels linked to Buddha remains go to auction, sparking ethical debate
items.description: Buddha’s sacred jewels, unearthed in 1898, head to auction at Sotheby’s, raising ethical concerns.

items.title: Clair Obscur: How a passion project became 2025's most talked-about game
items.description: The makers of a video game that even impressed the French president tell the unusual tale of its development.

items.title: How Katy Perry became the Hot and Cold popstar
items.description: The US singer says she feels "bruised" after weeks of online backlash - what's sparked the change?

items.title: Young men were getting a haircut ahead of Swedish festival - then they were shot dead
items.description: The Swedish city Uppsala broke into party spirit this week - but the killing of hair salon customers still wearing their capes left many shaken.
